original_text: Then he is to take off these clothes and put on others, and carry the ashes outside the camp to a place that is ceremonially clean.
korean_text: 그 옷을 벗고 다른 옷을 입고 그 재를 진영 바깥 정결한 곳으로 가져갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: Then he is to take off these clothes
and carry the ashes outside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 재를 진영 밖으로 운반해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to a place that is ceremonially clean
